players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I'm shocked Alice is dead. We should discuss who might be behind this and share our thoughts. Bob, your silence is concerning—anything to say?"
Diana: "I think we should all share any suspicions we have. Charlie, you're right about Bob's silence—it's worrying. Bob, what do you think happened to Alice?"
Charlie: "I agree with Diana; Bob's silence is really suspicious. If he doesn't explain himself, we might have to vote him out."
Diana: "Given Bob's ongoing silence, I believe he's the most suspicious and we should vote him out to protect ourselves."
